title: Men's Fashion Henley Shirt Classic Short/Long Sleeve Lightweight Button Cotton T-Shirt Casual Top
description: 【Material】:Cotton and Polyester.This short/long sleeve henley shirt super soft and elastic,keep you comfortable at all times.
【Feature】:Men's short/long sleeve casual henley shirts can easily match with shorts,formal pants,casual pants,twill cotton pants and jeans to create a casual and fashionable daily look.
【Design】:Classic four button placket short/long sleeved henley shirt design.The fashionable color contrast raglan short/long sleeve desige making clothes look more fashionable.
【Occasion】:These henley shirts suit for any casual occasions,such as daily wear,work,dating,friends gathering,business,daily,beach etc.

【Note】:Our fashion henley tops can machine washable.Please carefully refer to the t shirts size chart before ordering.Any problem about our product, please feel free to contact with us,we will respond and resolve your issues in a timely manner.Look forward to your choice.
